attributes.action: introduce a free I.D. card system for children and teenagers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The I.D. card primarily will allow children to show proof of age when purchasing tickets for the cinema or buying certain products instore. Most people nowadays do not like the idea of having to pay at least £10 to get an I.D. card just to prove their age.
